title: Find your name on the reef!

replies.body: Thanks Riot, Its look great and you guys kept your word on a massive task. I remember you guys were pretty surprised how quickly reached the target but you went ahead without hesitation. It shows you guys really care about building a better community.
Ok im certain i played that event and got the points but my name isnt there?

Hi xoxHoneyBadgerxx,

You earned 2 points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year). You won more games than those 2, but you or someone you queued up with was not using an Ocean Week champion so you did not earn a point for those games.

That's why your name is not on the reef.

You did earn 10 points during Ocean Week 2016 (this year). That means your name will be on the Ocean Week community wall which is currently in progress.

Cheers Sephyre, I've just gone back and reviewed the announcement page, because i was so sure i'd earnt the mark, did we keep earning points until the end of the event or only until the reef was unlocked? Because that might explain the confusion
Once the challenge phase was over (the reef being unlocked) points no longer counted towards the 3 points you needed.
This must be tiring for you guys down at riot to answer all these questions. I appreciate the fact that you go to the trouble to answer most of these questions gj Riot.

earned over x3 the points needed... name still aint on there despite signing up... please respond as to why my name's not on there because i know for a fact i earned atleast 30 points and i did sign up.

Hi Wheres My Ward,

You earned 2 points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year). You won some games on top of that, but you or someone you were queued up with were not using an Ocean Week champion so you didn't earn a point for that.

That's why you are not on the reef.

You did earn 46 points during Ocean Week 2016 (this year). So you will get your name on the Ocean Week Wall which is currently in progress.
What about me (for the 2015 version?) I'm not sure how to check but was sure I participated over 3 points. D:
Yeah, I swear i did as well, rip.
Can you please tell me how many points i got because i dont know, how many i got.
I cant remember what my summoner name was during OCW 2015 and so i cant find it RIP
Thanks Sephyre for the replies
I did not get my name on the bored and I got over 50pts riot sort this out thank you

As you can see Riot knows exactly how many points everyone got. I'm pretty sure they aren't messing up, you most likely got the 50 points in the latest event and will get your name on the wall. The Nautilus thing is separate from that. Just look at all the other people asking the same questions and getting the same response. Player: "I definitely got enough"  Riot: "No you didn't." You guys are hassling them for no reason. I just felt like posting this cause I feel bad for Riot since a lot of people are bombarding them with the same stuff cause they didn't get their name on THIS FREAKING BAD ASS SCULPTURE :)
WHOOO BABY IM UNDA DA SEA

wait what? wheres my name? how many points did i earn? cause it feel like i did at 3 points at the minimum....is it still in progress that they didn't add my name or is it just that i didn't do enough? cause i remember it saying i earn't 10 points for each place thingy for the crab attack stuff.... please?

the nautius reef is for last year's ocean week event not this year which was the sea monster / crab attack.
basically you get your name on a mural not on the reef (unless you had the points last year).
Kinda wish we could have had the opportunity to be there, looks great though.
Just wanting to know why my original ign name isn't on there "ToBeDaze", im pretty sure I did every ocean week? just strange because I played ocean week champs as much as I could.
just sad how I gained more than enough points but my name wasn't put on it

Well I'm pretty disappointed. My name definitely isn't on there. I know I earned 50+ points for 2015 Ocean Week. Name was CarnageLlama at the time and the only other name I've ever had is my current Big Bad KhaZix, and I'm not on the reef.. 

EDIT: Talking to my mates and apparently a lot of them can't find there names anywhere either

Hi Big Bad KhaZix,

I checked and you earned 1 point during Ocean Week 2015 (last year). You did win some additional games after the prize had been unlocked last year. The wins with an Ocean Week champion only counted before the Challenge Phase ended (eg: the server won the event).

That's why your name is not on the reef.

You did earn 53 points during Ocean Week 2016 (this year). So your name will be on the Ocean Week Wall. That's the wall mural and is currently in progress.

That doesn't sound right man. Me and all my friends thought a real life Nautilus Reef? The hell? We all wanted our name on that thing, we all made sure we met the requirements to get our names on the wall, we played the hell out of that.
Both years I've made well over enough points to get whatever rewards were up for grabs dude.
I've asked about 8 of my friends if their names are on the reef and all of them were as unhappy as I am to find it isn't. I'm positive something's gone wrong here.
when did you all start playing
I am almost positive that I earned enough to be on there.

Hi The D,

I checked and you earned 2 points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year). You did have some additional wins, but they came after the challenge phase had ended (the server had unlocked the reef) so they do not count towards your total.

That's why your name is not on the reef unfortunately.
Thats a bit upsetting. oh well thanks for checking :)
My name isnt there and im more than 100% certain i played the vent with all the right champs and all?!?!?

Hi TouchyKrol,

You did not earn any points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year). That's why your name is not on the reef.

You did earn 11 points during Ocean Week 2016 (this year) so you will get your name on the Ocean Week Wall. That's currently in progress.
I know for a fact i completed the games during that week and still my name is not on there..

Hi Jesse Anderson,

You did not earn any points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year) which is why your name is not on the reef.

You did earn 23 points during Ocean Week 2016 (this year). That means you will get your name on the Ocean Week Community Wall which is currently in progress.
My name isn't there and I earned 50 points, I want to get something for it because I worked really hard that week :'(

Hey Lazycrab6,

I checked and you did not earn a point during Ocean Week 2015 (last year) so your name is not on the reef.

You did earn 51 points during Ocean Week 2016, which means you will get your name on the Ocean Week Wall which is currently in progress.
ok thank you!!
My name isn't there ?!?!?!?!?!!?

Hey Vexon Velocity,

Your name is not on the reef because you did not earn any points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year).

You did earn 70 points in Ocean Week 2016 this year, so your name will be on the Ocean Week Community Wall - which is currently in progress and we will have updates in the future.
Whaaaaa!? I can't find my name, I had way more points than 10 i'm sure. Sadness..
This is for 2015 ocean week not the one we just had
So much is given to the community. <3 Riot.

Name isn't on there, but judging from the general response you guys are giving I'm gonna go ahead and assume I just didn't score any points last year.
I'm pretty sure I have the icon and stuff though.

I could've sworn I earn points, maybe i'm just on crack. 
1. But my name isn't thur. Having no {{champion:99}} today, too much bad {{champion:43}} When are you going to be able to {{champion:86}}tee the 2016 wall will be visible; the wait is making me {{champion:29}}

Hi SoCloseToStoned,

You earned 2 points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year). You or someone you were queueing with needed to be using an Ocean Week champion which was only the case for 2 of your wins in the challenge phase.

Unfortunately that's why your name is not on the reef.
I definitely fit all the criteria so why didnt my name get put up. ;(
My username that i got <10 points was called deluxe12E45678

My names not there but i got like 52 points the hell?
also HIII SEPHYRE I SAW U AT BRISBANE AIRPORT AT THE COUCH I WAS LIKE IS THAT ACTUALLY HIM I TOOK A PHOTO OF YOUR BACK (T-SHIRT) BAII
Oh it's fun searching the list for names that should probably be banned for inappropriate.. So many.
